mapper.sql: id, file_id, meta_data_id, meta_data_name, `status`, publish_time, `desc`, industry, rec_create_time, rec_update_time, `user`, user_type, meta_data_type, `usage`, data_token_address, attribute_data_token_address, sign
mapper.select: select md.*, ifnull(t.task_count, 0) as task_count from meta_data md left join (select meta_data_id, count(task_id) task_count from task_data_provider GROUP BY meta_data_id) t on md.meta_data_id = t.meta_data_id where md.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT md.*, df.size, df.location_type, df.data_hash, ifnull(t.task_count, 0) as task_count, dt.id as data_token_id, dt.name as data_token_name, dt.symbol as data_token_symbol, dt.status as data_token_status, adt.id as attribute_data_token_id, adt.name as attribute_data_token_name, adt.symbol as attribute_data_token_symbol, adt.status as attribute_data_token_status FROM meta_data md join data_file df on md.file_id = df.file_id left join (select meta_data_id, count(task_id) task_count from task_data_provider GROUP BY meta_data_id) t on md.meta_data_id = t.meta_data_id left join data_token dt on md.id = dt.meta_data_db_id left join attribute_data_token adt on md.id = adt.meta_data_db_id where md.status != 101 and md.`user` = #{userAddress}
AND IF( dt.STATUS IS NULL OR dt.STATUS = 2 OR adt.STATUS IS NULL OR adt.STATUS = 2 , FALSE , TRUE)
AND IF( dt.STATUS IS NULL OR dt.STATUS = 2 OR adt.STATUS IS NULL OR adt.STATUS = 2 , TRUE , FALSE)
and md.meta_data_name like concat('%' , #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
ORDER BY md.rec_create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into meta_data (file_id, meta_data_id, meta_data_name, status, publish_time, `desc`, industry, `user`, meta_data_type, `usage`) values (#{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{metaDataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{metaDataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user}, #{metaDataType}, #{usage})
mapper.update: update meta_data set file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meta_data_id = #{metaDataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meta_data_name = #{metaDataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, publish_time = #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sign = #{sign} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update.foreach: update meta_data set `status` = #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, publish_time = #{item.publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_update_time = #{item.recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_token_address = #{item.dataTokenAddress}, attribute_data_token_address = #{item.attributeDataTokenAddress} where meta_data_id = #{item.metaDataId} and `status` in (0, 1, 2, 3, 101, 102, 103)

mapper.select: select md.id, dt.address as data_token_address from meta_data md left join data_token dt on md.id = dt.meta_data_db_id where md.status = 2 and dt.status = 3 and md.data_token_address is null

select md.id, adt.address as attribute_data_token_address from meta_data md left join attribute_data_token adt on md.id = adt.meta_data_db_id where md.status = 2 and adt.status = 3 and md.attribute_data_token_address is null
